news_header: Israel has approved a prisoner exchange agreement with Hamas, involving a truce and the release of hostages.
news_text: On Tuesday morning, Israel announced an agreement with Hamas for a reciprocal exchange of prisoners and a truce. The agreement includes the release of 33 hostages over six weeks, with Israel potentially releasing hundreds of Palestinian women and children in return. The first phase involves the release of five female Israeli soldiers, each exchanged for 50 Palestinian prisoners, including 30 serving life sentences. Israeli troops will withdraw from settlements, allowing Palestinians to return home, while humanitarian aid will significantly increase.
